sentences.en: Australians are justly proud of their native wildlife.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚人有充分的理由为他们的野生动物感到骄傲。

sentences.en: Before all this the island was populated by native American Arawaks.
sentences.cn: 在所有这一切发生之前，这个岛上居住的是印第安阿拉瓦克人。

sentences.en: Dr Aubin is a native of St Blaise.
sentences.cn: 奥宾博士是圣布莱斯人。

sentences.en: English is not the native language for almost half of our overseas visitors.
sentences.cn: 我们有差不多一半的海外游客母语不是英语。

sentences.en: Feathers of various kinds are used by Native Americans for ceremonial purposes.
sentences.cn: 美洲印第安人在举行仪式时用到各种羽毛。

sentences.en: He has become a native of Glasgow.
sentences.cn: 他已经成了格拉斯哥人。

sentences.en: He recalls his native Bombay with cinematic exactness.
sentences.cn: 对出生地孟买的回忆一幕幕清晰地呈现在他脑海里。

sentences.en: He spent most of his professional life outside his native Poland.
sentences.cn: 他大部分的职业生涯都没在祖国波兰度过。

sentences.en: her native wit
sentences.cn: 她天生的机智风趣

sentences.en: It was his first visit to his native country since 1948.
sentences.cn: 这是自1948年以来他首次回到自己的祖国。

sentences.en: Joshua Halpern is a native Northern Californian.
sentences.cn: 乔舒亚·哈尔彭是土生土长的北加州人。

sentences.en: Many of the plants are native to Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这些植物中有很多原产地在巴西。

sentences.en: Mother Teresa visited her native Albania.
sentences.cn: 特雷莎修女访问了她的祖国阿尔巴尼亚。

sentences.en: Our best man was sent to treat with the native leaders.
sentences.cn: 我们最能干的人被派去和当地领导人谈判.

sentences.en: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.cn: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.en: The coconut palm is a native of Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 椰子树原产于马来西亚。

sentences.en: The eagle is the animal most sacred to the Native Americans.
sentences.cn: 对印第安人来说，鹰是最神圣的动物。

sentences.en: They never saw their native land again.
sentences.cn: 他们再也没见到故土。

sentences.en: This is my native land and I'll defend it with my life!
sentences.cn: 这是我的祖国,我将用生命保卫她.

sentences.en: We have our native inborn talent, yet we hardly use it.
sentences.cn: 我们有天生的才能，但我们却几乎未曾使用过。

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

sentences.en: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.cn: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
先天论者；本土主义者；本土文化保护者
出生；出生地；（Nativity）耶稣的诞生
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家

phrases.tran_cn: (幽默 或 贬)（身处他乡的人）融入当地，土著化
本国语言；本机语言；机器各单元间编码语言
说母语的人，说本族语的人

trans.tran_cn: 出生地的，本地的，本国/地语的，土著的，原产地的，天赋的
trans.tran_en: your native country, town etc is the place where you were born

trans.tran_cn: 出生于某国/地的人，本国/地人，土著，本地动植物
trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time
